duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and direct the effective and efficient management of the SABIC Technologies deployment while working with different stakeholders.
Develop deployment plan for all SABIC proprietary packages & Catalyst utilizing internal resources and capabilities.
Leads project execution by representing SABIC AS licensor for fulfilling License obligations during Engineering, commissioning and start-up for SABIC proprietary packages.
Lead engagement with proprietary equipment vendors for SABIC technologies to maximize the revenues for smooth execution of SABIC, SABIC Affiliates, its JVs complex mega projects globally.
Manage dispute cases negotiation and resolution with respect to change orders and scope changes in License and Engineering Agreements.
Lead, manage & train team for SABIC, SABIC Affiliates, its JVs complex mega projects globally.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in Chemical Engineering or Mechanical Engineering +15 years of experience in handling proprietary equipment and technology solutions for license outIP knowledge
